title: Convert String to Month Integer
description: This function takes a string representation of a month and converts it into its corresponding integer value, using a specified language setting. If the string does not match any of the month names in the chosen language, it attempts to convert the string directly to an integer.
name: FSTRING_TO_MONTH

input.name: MTH
input.description: A string representing the month to be converted.

input.name: LANG
input.description: An integer representing the language setting. Use 0 for default language, or a specific language index.

return_value.description: Returns the integer representation of the month (1-12), or the integer value of the string if no match is found.
